thread.title: Video: Spurs fans rejoice as Chelsea stars feud
thread.title_full: Video: Spurs fans rejoice as Chelsea stars feud

title: Video: Spurs fans rejoice as Chelsea stars feud
text:
Tottenham v Chelsea: Diego Costa, Pedro stuck in argument during Premier League clash FOX SPORTS January 5, 2017 9:53am 
TOTTENHAM’S Premier League clash with Chelsea was full of tension – and that was just between teammates. 
The first-half of their 2-0 win over their fierce rivals, which ended the Blues’ streak of consecutive wins at 13, was tight and tense, with both sides struggling to carve an opening against resolute defence. 
Then, Chelsea surged forward in the middle of a trademark counter-attack, with Spurs stretched, and an opening imminent – until Pedro and Diego Costa got their wires crossed. 
Cue absolute disgust from the Chelsea marksman at his compatriot, Pedro, who made a run that saw the move break down. 
Still, after his initial annoyance, Costa didn’t stop and continued to berate his colleague – much to the amusement of the White Hart Lane faithful, especially as the former Barcelona star decided to return serve. media_camera Pedro of Chelsea (L) and Diego Costa of Chelsea (R) argue. media_camera Pedro of Chelsea (L) and Diego Costa of Chelsea (R). media_camera Still going .... 
Costa has been on his best behaviour this season in a prolific campaign ... but it still doesn’t take much to spark the firebrand! 
It comes after Alexis Sanchez’s frustration at his Arsenal teammates against Bournemouth. Perhaps the Chilean needed to take a leaf out of Costa’s book to really get his frustration off his chest! Alli on fire against Chelsea 1:24 
EPL: Dele Alli opens the scoring in the London derby between Chelsea and Tottenham at White Hart Lane January 5th 2017
